…that joined me today in offering  this call for humanity: Senators Bennet, Booker, Duckworth, Durbin,  Hirono, Kaine, King, Heinrich, Hickenlooper, Kim, Klobuchar, Markey,  Merkley, Murphy, Murray, Sanders, Schatz, Shaheen, Slotkin, Smith, Van  Hollen, Warner, Warnock, Warren, and Wyden.

Mr. President, I want to conclude my remarks tonight by sharing…
